A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Judging from the commercial flop of SOLO\, I'm guessing people didn't like Last Jedi.  I certainly didn't. Its the film that killed Star Wars. But perhaps thats what Rian Johnson wanted? After all the theme of Last Jedi is \"Let the past die. Kill it if you have to.\" Well Rian\, if killing 40 years of love for Star Wars was your intention\, congratulations! You succeeded.
